title: Strengthening Scientific Problem-Solving Competencies through Learning Design Modeling Workshops

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: Workshop-based problem-solving activities using a science-specific learning design modeling language.

learning_goals: Participants can design science experiment scenarios by applying IMS Learning Design (LD) concepts.
Participants can manage the lifecycle of learning activities (design-execution-evaluation-revision) using educational modeling languages.
Participants can develop learning design templates that incorporate teacher-learner interaction elements.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
